aboutme: I am a seasoned software developer with four years of experience, including three years of remote work. I have effectively collaborated with global teams to develop detailed and high-quality software solutions. My main area of expertise is frontend development, although my efforts have also led me to gain deep knowledge in other areas of the development process.
